body.style: background:#ffffff url('wpimages/wp20e0c86e_06.png') repeat scroll top center; height:1000px;

div.span: We will have our next packet pickup/drop off on Monday, April 13th from 11:30-1:00 at the baseball field parking lot. You may also return any library books that students are no longer using. The information in the packets we are distributing will cover the next 3 weeks of instruction. In addition, we will have Herff Jones set up for our Juniors and Seniors to pick up their class rings, and Senior graduation cap/gowns and invitations. Please have all your items paid for directly to Herff Jones or money with you, when you come to pick up items. I would again like to thank you all for your efforts with your children as we work from home. We have asked our teachers to maintain a consistent channel of communication with all of our students to assist them with their work as well as check their progress. Please continue to spend daily dedicated time with your children and help them with their work. For everyone’s safety, please stay in the pickup line and we will bring the packets to your vehicle.
Check out: School Agendas and Projects
Check out: Separated We Stand Together

Mumford ISD and its schools do not discriminate on the basis of gender, disability, race, color, or national origin in its educational programs, activities, or employment as required by Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.

These pictures were taken by our staff and yearbook student photographers to give you a peek at the activities and events taking place at Mumford ISD.
